Welcome to Moleculens

AI-assisted 3-D visualisation of atoms, molecules, and massive biomacromolecules – right in your browser.

Get Started

Small & Large Molecules

From methane to ribosomes – one viewer, infinite scale.

Natural-Language Prompts

Ask for a molecule by name; the AI fetches, converts, and renders it instantly.

GPU-Optimised Rendering

Smart instancing and point clouds keep frame-rates smooth, even with >100k atoms.
